item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: DevSachi
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: DevSachi
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://devsachi.unaux.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitorâ€™s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Contact Us

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vocalic and Consonantal, there live the blind texts. Separated they live.

  • Get Started

Email:

sample@email.com

Contact

Call:

+01(343-980)87

Call

Location:

Metrocity USA, HWY 1235

Location

item.title: Blog Home
item.dc:creator: DevSachi
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I am Sachinthana! A web developer

I'm Sachinthana Gunathilaka, a passionate web developer, tech enthusiast, and lifelong learner. I specialize in Python, C#, and web development, backed by a solid foundation in networking and digital marketing. My education includes a Master of Computer Applications from the University of Moratuwa and certifications from Cisco, AWS, and freeCodeCamp. I'm always on the lookout for innovative solutions and the latest advancements in technology.

2

+

Years of Experience

86

+

Projects Completed

/ My Story

My first website design back in 2022

Back in 2022, I created my very first website design. It was a huge learning experience for me, and it laid the foundation for my journey as a web developer. While simple in its structure, this project taught me the fundamentals of design, coding, and user experience â€“ skills that I continue to build on today.

/ About me

Why I built my career as a web developer

From a young age, Iâ€™ve been fascinated by how technology shapes our world. The internet, in particular, captivated me â€“ itâ€™s a space where creativity meets functionality, and endless possibilities are just a few lines of code away. Thatâ€™s why I decided to build my career as a web developer.

For me, web development isnâ€™t just about writing code. Itâ€™s about problem-solving, designing user-friendly experiences, and bringing ideas to life in the digital world. I love the challenge of crafting websites and applications that not only look great but also perform seamlessly. Every project is a new opportunity to innovate and push the boundaries of whatâ€™s possible online.

Ultimately, I became a web developer because it allows me to combine my passion for technology with the joy of creating things that make a difference in peopleâ€™s lives.

Letâ€™s explore the digital future together!

/ Skills

Extensive Coding Languages I am Proficient In

HTML & CSS

Crafting visually stunning, responsive layouts that transform ideas into engaging web pages.

node js

Building robust server-side applications that drive dynamic and interactive web experiences

React js

Developing modern, responsive user interfaces with a component-based architecture for seamless interactivity.

/Portfolio

Have a look on some latest projects of mine

ReactJs

Web Developer

Website design for a food / travel blogger

ReactJs

Web Developer

Website project for a business agency

ReactJs

Web Developer

Design studio / Agency Theme Website Project for FotaWP

ReactJs

Web Developer

News Agency fullstack web development

"I'm always exploring new ideas and innovations in web development, applying my skills to push the boundaries of whatâ€™s possible and elevate the technical quality of every project I work on."

Sachinthana

Web Developer & Software Engineer

IT Industry

/ services

Here's what I can do for you

Frontend

I specialize in building intuitive and responsive user interfaces, using modern frameworks like React, Vue.js, and HTML/CSS. My focus is on delivering seamless, visually appealing experiences that enhance user engagement across devices.

Backend

I work with server-side technologies such as Node.js, Python (Django/Flask), and SQL/NoSQL databases, ensuring efficient data management, API integrations, and overall application scalability. My backend solutions are secure, optimized, and ready to handle complex business logic.

devops

With a strong understanding of DevOps practices, I streamline the development pipeline by automating deployments, managing infrastructure as code (using tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines), and ensuring continuous delivery and integration for faster, more reliable software releases

Interested in Working with me?

Let's Talk

Feel free to reach out â€“ Iâ€™m always excited to work on new projects and help businesses grow through innovative web solutions.
item.excerpt:encoded: Displays the latest posts as either the site homepage or as the "Posts page" as defined under reading settings. If it exists, the Front Page template overrides this template when posts are shown on the homepage.
